lines.text:
[examining the treasure map]
It's amazing, positively amazing!
You mean it's on the level?
On the level? Do you mean authentic?
Oh, what we want to know - is it real?
Can somebody tell me why lobsters don't like beer?
This place gives me the heebie-jeebies! It reminds me of prison.

[after a mysterious noise]
Don't be frightened, folks. It's just Morgan's ghost. He resents our coming here.

[over the loudspeaker]
Leave the castle... leave the castle!
